title: Country Places
description: This book informs students about the types of things located in the country. Students will learn about all of these places and their purposes. Detailed, supportive illustrations and repetitive phrases support early readers.
reviewWords: city, corral, country, farmhouse, orchard, shed
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Initial Consonants                : Discriminate initial consonant /f/ sound
grammar: Punctuation                : Recognize and use question marks
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency word this
